Vanessa Burke

Your friendly neighbourhood creative (and wannabe programmer).

Hi, I'm Vanessa—a designer, problem solver and user-experience enthusiast with 15+ years of experience based in Edmonton, Canada. I'm a hometown gal—and as such, am excited by challenging problems and opportunities to grow and build our communities.

Fuelled by coffee and curiosity

I earned my Bachelor of Design in Visual Communication (with a specialization in Computing Science) from the University of Alberta. Although I didn't pursue graduate studies, I am constantly in pursuit of knowledge and have taken courses of all kinds over the years—from photography to Ruby to Edmonton's Compost S'cool. My current interests include a mix of data visualization, sustainability and diversity.

The little things

When I'm not working, you can find me on the ultimate frisbee field (virtually, atm), baking things with lots of butter, puttering around in the garden or wrangling kiddos.

Let's build stuff!
